mapper.sql:
SELECT -1*IFNULL(SUM(y.payout),0) payout, IFNULL(SUM(validbet),0) validBet,IFNULL(SUM(bet),0) bet,t.loginname,t.id accountid, t.cagencyId,t.subcagencyid from rpt_bet_rcd_day y LEFT JOIN mbr_account t ON y.username = t.loginname LEFT JOIN agy_account t2 ON t2.id = t.cagencyid
AND y.startday >= str_to_date(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND y.startday <= str_to_date(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY y.username
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(bonusamount) FROM opr_act_bonus WHERE loginname=#{loginname} and `status`=1
SELECT SUM(validbet) FROM rpt_bet_rcd_day WHERE username=#{loginname}
